name: Dunk Star!
description:
Dunk your way to the top of the tower!

Gather stars and try to unlock one of the 30+ balls available, from a simple BasketBall to a Burger and even a Cat!

Swipe your finger and toss basketballs in multiple levels!
How many can you dunk?



- Free to Play
- Easy to handle gameplay
- Clean beautiful design
- Tons of balls and special effects to unlock
- Lots of levels to master
